name: Manage new bookings from YouCanBook.me via KlickTipp
description:
This workflow component automatically processes new bookings from YouCanBook.me and creates or updates corresponding contacts in KlickTipp. When a new appointment is scheduled, the system captures booking details such as attendee information, start and end times, and meeting link, then syncs them to KlickTipp with predefined tags and opt-in processes.

The integration intelligently maps key data, including the attendeeâ€™s email, phone number, first and last name, as well as booking metadata like start/end timestamps and Google Meet URL. If a contact with the provided email already exists in KlickTipp, their profile is updated instead of creating duplicates. This ensures accurate and up-to-date contact records.

Perfect for businesses that rely on appointment-based workflows and want to automate lead management, event registration, and customer engagement.

Requires active YouCanBook.me and KlickTipp connections and correct configuration of tags, opt-in processes, and custom fields.
